# Kuźnica-Folwark

Kuźnica-Folwark () is a settlement in the administrative district of Gmina Poraj, within Myszków County, Silesian Voivodeship, in southern Poland. It lies approximately  south of Poraj,  north-west of Myszków, and  north of the regional capital Katowice.
